actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction from gross income to individuals for expenses paid in using mass transit facilities.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction, to both itemizers and nonitemizers, for mass transit expenses paid by a taxpayer.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction from gross income to individuals for expenses paid in using mass transit facilities.
